title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.
highlights: pull/run any GGUF model with one command

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.
highlights: chat, generate, embed, list, pull, delete endpoints

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI).
highlights: RAG with uploaded docs, web search, voice input

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI wrapper around Ollama with shell completions and fzf model picker.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for chatting and generating code with Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and Blazor demo for Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to containerize and CI-test Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to expose Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama PyPI package
summary: Official Python package published to PyPI.
